Key Match Events: Mohammed Kudus scored both goals for Ghana.
Omar Marmoush and Mostafa Mohamed scored for Egypt.
Mohamed Salah limped off holding the back of his left thigh before halftime.
Kudus scored in first-half injury time.
Egypt had a goal ruled out through VAR for offside.
Kudus scored again two minutes later.
Mohamed equalized three minutes after Kudus' second goal.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ghana remained bottom of Group B with just one point, level with Mozambique.
Egypt was second in Group B, two points behind group leader Cape Verde.
Cape Verde and Mozambique play their second game of the tournament on Friday.
Only the top two in each group are assured of advancing.
